question: How does the person drag some dry stems from a barbed wire fence with his left hand?
options: The person pulls the dry stems from the barbed wire fence with his left hand, quickly removing them and letting them fall softly to the side.
The person lifts the dry stems with his left hand, attempting to take them away before tossing them gently over his shoulder.
The person guides the dry stems away from the barbed wire fence using his left hand, moving them smoothly and walking away calmly.
The person drags some dry stems from a barbed wire fence with his left hand, gently pulling them away and throwing them on the ground.
The person holds the dry stems with his left hand, pulling them toward himself and keeping them closely instead of letting them go.
